products.title: Splash Duck Egg Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash duck egg roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it works perfectly with natural and wooden tones throughout the home. The fabric is moisture restitance making it a go to for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chrome control chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window.

products.title: Splash Mid Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Splash mid grey roller blinds are a beautiful contemporary cool grey colour. A timeless grey colour that will compliment most color palettes within the home or office. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your space. Also, their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee providing additional peace of mind when investing in this product.

products.title: Splash Tropez Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Splash tropez has an elegant grey/brown hue, with its rich earthy tones it will compliment a vast range of interior colour palettes. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which provides extra peace of mind that you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Ruby Red Roller Blind
products.description: Splash ruby red is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash ruby red roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

products.title: Splash Grey Roller Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

products.title: Splash Dark Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful contemporary. The dark grey roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring acorn pull which removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. The splash dark grey roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens.
